title: Ticket #5904: Specifying ID restriction to condor_q supporessed HOLD column
description:
Hmm -- not only is the HOLD column suppressed, the held job totally disappears from the job counts: 

  manta(125)% condor_q


  -- Schedd: wenger@manta.cs.wisc.edu : <128.105.14.228:9619?...
  OWNER  BATCH_NAME     SUBMITTED   DONE   RUN    IDLE   HOLD  TOTAL JOB_IDS
  wenger ex1.dag+619   9/14 10:46      3      _      _      1      5 624.1


  3 jobs; 0 completed, 0 removed, 0 idle, 2 running, 1 held, 0 suspended


  manta(126)% condor_q 619


  -- Schedd: wenger@manta.cs.wisc.edu : <128.105.14.228:9619?...
  OWNER  BATCH_NAME     SUBMITTED   DONE   RUN    IDLE  TOTAL JOB_IDS
  wenger ex1.dag+619   9/14 10:46      3      _      _      5 0.0


  2 jobs; 0 completed, 0 removed, 0 idle, 2 running, 0 held, 0 suspended


  manta(127)% condor_q


  -- Schedd: wenger@manta.cs.wisc.edu : <128.105.14.228:9619?...
  OWNER  BATCH_NAME     SUBMITTED   DONE   RUN    IDLE   HOLD  TOTAL JOB_IDS
  wenger ex1.dag+619   9/14 10:46      3      _      _      1      5 624.1


  3 jobs; 0 completed, 0 removed, 0 idle, 2 running, 1 held, 0 suspended
  manta(128)%
creator: wenger
